remarks: Proof of class extensionality from the axiom of set extensionality ( ~ ax-ext ) and the definition of class equality ( ~ bj-df-cleq ). (Contributed by BJ, 24-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-dfcleq $p |- ( A = B <-> A. x ( x e. A <-> x e. B ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
